post:
M.S MacroBash Pvt Ltd is set up with an aim to serve customers in an excellent manner by providing them quality service. We strongly believe in high quality standards and Hence you’ll always find our services better than every other host in this industry. We understand the value of time and hence our ordering process is very simple. Customers can choose servers from multiple price levels to suit their business module.

Accepted Forms Of Payments : All Types of Credit/Debit/Amex Card Accepted, PayPal, Bitcoin, Western Union and Bank Transfers (International Wire Transfers),

Features We Certainly Known For:

- 24/7 Ticket Support
- 24/7/365 Server Monitoring With Constant Monitoring
- A High-Capacity, High-Speed, Highly Redundant BGP Routed Cisco Systems Network
- Enterprise-Grade Dell Server Hardware
- A Strong Service Level Agreement (SLA)
- 100% Network Connectivity SLA
- Multiple Tier 3 10Gbps Connections To The Internet
- Peering with LINX, Telia, Virgin Media, Zen, BT, Entanet, TiNet, Goscomb
- Tier 3 Data Centre Facilities

Not Yet Satisfied ?

Macro Bash is Located in a Tier 3 datacenter in Amsterdam (The Netherlands). We have Placed our equipment in our own racks in a private corridor with room for 38 racks. The network contains only the best connections like : AMS-IX, Global Crossing, Level13, etc. The network connectivity is done by Smart DC and setup fully redundant with Brocade routers in the core. Smart DC has multiple POPs (Point of Presences) to guarantee a very high network uptime to us.

Transit:
